function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 through commuting, tourists, and businesspeople","Impact":"Increased transmission of the virus and potential health inequities","Mitigation":"Designing mixed-use neighborhoods focused on walking and biking, and reducing transportation","Technologies":"Urban planning and design strategies, transportation advancements","People":"Commuters, tourists, businesspeople, residents","Owner":"Urban planners, architects, local government"},{"Description":"Health inequities derived from urban development","Impact":"Unequal access to healthcare and increased vulnerability to pandemics","Mitigation":"Improving access to healthcare, addressing socio-economic disparities, and implementing public health measures","Technologies":"Healthcare infrastructure, public health initiatives","People":"Residents of different socio-economic backgrounds","Owner":"Local government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of environmental impacts on zoonosis and deforestation","Impact":"Increased risk of zoonotic diseases and infectious outbreaks","Mitigation":"Conservation of natural habitats, sustainable urban planning, and environmental protection","Technologies":"Environmental conservation efforts, sustainable urban design","People":"General population, wildlife","Owner":"Environmental organizations, government agencies, conservation groups"}]}
